abstract: Busch Stadium management has placed traps to catch the squirrels that have interrupted two playoff games between the Cardinals and Phillies.
snippet: Busch Stadium management has placed traps to catch the squirrels that have interrupted two playoff games between the Cardinals and Phillies.
lead_paragraph: Most people found great amusement in the squirrel(s) who dashed onto the field at Busch Stadium during Games 3 and 4 between the Cardinals and Phillies, and he has since been called the Rally Squirrel, complete with his own Twitter page. You can count Phillies pitcher Roy Oswalt among those who were not amused, nor was Busch Stadium's management. The stadium groundskeepers have now set up squirrel traps to prevent the resident critters from causing future mayhem.
